## ...on the Changes of National Stock Indices.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE, cache=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
### Germany
p1 <- ggplot(data = merge10, aes(x = Date, y = DAX.Close.change)) + geom_line() + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1991.1, 2015.4, 10)) + ggtitle("Germany | DAX") + theme(plot.title = element_text(size=14)) + labs(x = "Quarters", y = "Av. Closing Value") + theme(legend.position="none") + theme(axis.text=element_text(size=8),
        axis.title=element_text(size=8))
### Japan
p2 <- ggplot(data = merge10, aes(x = Date, y = NIK.Close.change)) + geom_line() + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1991.1, 2015.4, 10)) + ggtitle("Japan | NIKKEI") + theme(plot.title = element_text(size=14)) + labs(x = "Quarters", y = "Av. Closing Value") + theme(legend.position="none") + theme(axis.text=element_text(size=8),
        axis.title=element_text(size=8))
### France
p3 <- ggplot(data = merge10, aes(x = Date, y = CAC.Close.change)) + geom_line() + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1991.1, 2015.4, 10)) + ggtitle("France | CAC40") + theme(plot.title = element_text(size=14)) + labs(x = "Quarters", y = "Av. Closing Value") + theme(legend.position="none") + theme(axis.text=element_text(size=8),
        axis.title=element_text(size=8))
### Great Britain
p4 <- ggplot(data = merge10, aes(x = Date, y = FTSE.Close.change)) + geom_line() + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1991.1, 2015.4, 10)) + ggtitle("Great Britain | FTSE") + theme(plot.title = element_text(size=14)) + labs(x = "Quarters", y = "Av. Closing Value") + theme(legend.position="none") + theme(axis.text=element_text(size=8),
        axis.title=element_text(size=8))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
multiplot(p1, p2, p3, p4, cols = 2)
```

## The four National Indices 
(aka the four Dependent Variables)

**Dependent Variables** | Scope
 -------------------- | -----------------------
 DAX (Germany)        | 30 major Companies
 CAC (France)         | 40 highest Market Caps
 FTSE (Great Britain) | 100 Companies
 NIKKEI (Japan)       | 225 Equities

## Joint Distribution DVs and key IV

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE, cache=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
##DEU
p15 <- ggplot(merge10, aes(x = L.DEU.GDP, y = DAX.Close.change)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth() +
  ggtitle("Germany") +
  xlab("GDP Growth") +
  ylab("DAX Growth Rate in %") +
  theme(axis.text=element_text(size=8),
        axis.title=element_text(size=8)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=10))
```
